text: André Jobin (25 October 1927 – 8 October 2024), known as Job, was a Swiss comics writer and artist. He was probably best known for his western children's comics series Yakari. He was born in Delémont, Switzerland. His career began in 1964 as a journalist. Job died on 8 October 2024, at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Swiss writers Category:Swiss artists Category:Swiss journalists Category:Comics artists Category:Comics writers Category:People from the canton of Jura
title: Job (comics)
